professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in SQL Server and Oracle databases. Skilled in data management, performance optimization, troubleshooting, and network monitoring.

key_responsibilities: Transfers and replicates data accurately and quickly.
Maintains distributed SQL Server database and ensures its availability to global users of the WRAPS system.
Monitors database performance using tools like Ignite or SQL Diagnostics Manager/Spotlight on SQL Server and resolves issues related to load and processing.
Develops data import/export routines and creates windows/screens for system requirements.
Maintains databases and upgrades Oracle versions (e.g.
Performs code maintenance and supports systems handling sensitive data.
Monitors and manages network devices and systems for TSA.
Creates queries for TSA database and maintains Solar Winds configuration.
Installs and configures airport communication systems and supports custom applications.
